title: Cory Gardner
summary: Cory Scott Gardner[1] (born August 22, 1974) is an American attorney, lobbyist, and politician who served as a United States Senator from Colorado from 2015 to 2021. A Republican, he was the U.S. Representative for Colorado's 4th congressional district from 2011 to 2015 and a member of the Colorado House of Representatives from 2005 to 2011.
